check-in.title: Check-in at a place.
check-in.description: With this application you can check-in at a place.
check-in.checked-in-description: You have been checked in the room {{room}} until {{time}}.
check-in.checked-in-with-seat-description: You have been checked in the room {{room}} at seat {{seat}} until {{time}}.
check-in.hash-false-body: The scanned room does not exist, please contact a TU Graz employee.
check-in.qr-false-body: This code is not for this application. Please use a check-in QR code.
check-in.success-checkin-seat-body: You have successfully checked into {{room}} at #{{seat}}.
check-in.no-permission-body: You have no permissions to perform this action. Please contact the local IT support.
check-in.already-checkin-body: You are already registered here. You can extend your current registration or check out at this location.
check-in.invalid-seatnr-body: The seat number entered does not exist. Please contact an employee in the building services department or enter a different seat number.
check-in.no-seatnr-body: The specified room has no seats. Please register without a seat number.
check-in.invalid-input-body: Your input was invalid. Please try again.
check-in.success-refresh-body: You have successfully extended your check-in in the {{room}}.
check-in.refresh-failed-body: Refreshing your check-in failed. Please try again.
check-in.other-checkins-notification-body: You have one more checkin at another location.
check-in.other-checkins-notification-body_plural: You have {{count}} more checkins at other locations.
check-in.data-protection: What does TU Graz do with your data? You can find the data protection declaration for the app "TU Graz checkin " here:
check-in.how-to: Scan the QR code on your place with the QR code reader of this application, or select your seat manually to checkin at this location. If there is a possible COVID-19 infection, you will be contacted by TU Graz by email.

check-out.title: Show all check-ins
check-out.description: With this application you can check-out from your registered locations.
check-out.checkout-success-body: You have successfully checked out of the {{room}}.
check-out.checkout-failed-body: Your checkout from {{room}} failed. We're sorry, something went wrong.
check-out.no-checkins-message: You are currently not checked-in at any location..

guest-check-in.title: Guest registration
guest-check-in.description: With this application you can register a guest at a location.
guest-check-in.invalid-email-address-body: The e-mail address you entered does not correspond to a valid format. Please check your input and try again.
guest-check-in.error-permission-message: You need to have a staff account to use this function!
guest-check-in.no-time-body: Please enter a time for checkout.
guest-check-in.past-time-body: Please enter a time in the future for checkout.
guest-check-in.max-time-body: Please enter a time not more than 3 hours in the future.
guest-check-in.data-protection: With the checkin I confirm that I have made the data protection declaration for the "TU Graz check-in" app known to the guest I have checked in.
guest-check-in.how-to: Checkin a guest at a location for the duration of the visit so that they can be contacted by email from TU Graz in the event of a possible COVID-19 infection.

info.title: Information
info.description: With this application you get information about checkin.tugraz.at.

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
